sentences.english: The Early Palaeozoic strata of the upper-Yangtze region are fully developed in Guizhou Province and its adjacent areas.
sentences.chinese: 上揚子區下古生界在貴州及其鄰區發育較爲完整。

sentences.english: Jiaozhou Bay and its adjacent area are getting more and more important in the economic and social development of Tsingtao city.
sentences.chinese: 膠州灣及其鄰區在青島市經濟和社會發展中日趨重要。

sentences.english: The eastern Qinghai-Tibet plateau and adjacent areas is the most typical mainland lithosphere distortion zone.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原東部及鄰區爲典型的大陸地殼變形區。

sentences.english: And the influence of doing so to the seismic activity in Xi'an and its adjacent areas should be monitored and studied further.
sentences.chinese: 研究熱水回灌方法對西安及鄰區地震活動性的影響。
